Fri, 08 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 There is no guarantee a hugely popular section of the Takapuna-Milford Walkway in Takapuna will be open for summer walkers after a dispute between Auckland Council and the owners of the Firth cottage remains unresolved. Auckland mayor Wayne Brown has levelled blackmail accusations. Photos / Dean Purcell / Michael Craig
